security: Revealing that the agency utilizes 'military cover backstop' programs and specific forms and procedures to manage these programs could expose intelligence sources, methods, or operations.
summary: This notification concerns the cancellation of military cover backstop for an individual and instructs the Personnel Operations Division to unblock records, submit a form to change the limitation category, and return all military documentation.
summary_one_paragraph: This is a secret notification dated March 20, 1975, from the Chief Operating Component to the Chief of the Personnel Operations Division, regarding the cancellation of a military cover backstop. The notification instructs the recipient to unblock records by July 31, 1976, submit Form 642 to change the limitation category, and return all military documentation to CCS, referencing 'MILITARYECOVER&CCE'.
title: Notification of Cancellation of Military Cover Backstop
